successes.title: Deluxe Wraith: the Oblivion 20th Anniversary Edition
successes.description: Contribute to help give the Deluxe Wraith20th a leather bound, embossed+, bookmarked, silver-edged, full-color, deluxe treatment.

Pledges.description: You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as one of our supporters: the army of the night.

You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as one of our supporters: the army of the night.

Arcanum Seeker: You'll receive PDFs of the classic Wraith Players' Guide and Shadow Players' Guide, to allow you to further explore your characters. You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as one of The Quick.

Arcanum Explorer: You'll receive PDFs of four classic Wraith setting books (Haunts, Midnight Express, Necropolis: Atlanta, and Sea of Shadows), to allow you to further delve into the world of Wraith. You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as one of The Quick.

Enfant: You'll receive a PDF of Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition. You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as an Enfant.

Seeker Enfant: You'll receive a PDF of Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition. You'll receive PDFs of the classic Wraith Players' Guide and Shadow Players' Guide, to allow you to further explore your characters. You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as an Enfant.

Enfant Explorer: You'll receive a PDF of Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition. You'll receive PDFs of four classic Wraith setting books (Haunts, Midnight Express, Necropolis: Atlanta, and Sea of Shadows), to allow you to further delve into the world of Wraith. You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as an Enfant.

Seeker Enfant Explorer: You'll receive a PDF of Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition. You'll receive PDFs of the classic Wraith Players' Guide and Shadow Players' Guide, to allow you to further explore your characters, as well as PDFs of four classic Wraith setting books (Haunts, Midnight Express, Necropolis: Atlanta, and Sea of Shadows), to allow you to further delve into the world of Wraith. You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as an Enfant.

PDF STARTER KIT: You'll receive a PDF of Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition. You'll receive  PDFs of four classic Wraith setting books (Haunts, Midnight Express, Necropolis: Atlanta, and Sea of Shadows), as well as all six of the Guildbooks, to allow you to further delve into the world of Wraith. You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as an Enfant.

Haunted Enfant: You'll receive a PDF of Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition. You'll receive PDFs of the previous three Twentieth Anniverary Editions: Vampire20, Werewolf20, and Mage20. You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as an Enfant.

Restless Dead: You will receive a copy of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, a copy of the Wraith 20th PDF, and the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left). You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as a Wraith. Please note extra for shipping outside US/Canada.

Shrouded Restless Dead: You will receive a copy of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, a copy of the Wraith 20th PDF, and the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left). You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You will also receive the Wraith 20th Storyteller's Screen, a sturdy three-panel screen featuring darkly beautiful art from the Wr20 book on the outer side, and on the inside there's a selection of charts and other info to make the Storyteller's job a little bit easier. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as a Wraith. Please note extra for shipping outside US/Canada.

Reaper: You will receive a copy of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, a copy of the Wraith 20th PDF, and the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left). You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as a Reaper. You'll receive PDFs of the classic Wraith Players' Guide and Shadow Players' Guide, to allow you to further explore your characters, as well as PDFs of four classic Wraith setting books (Haunts, Midnight Express, Necropolis: Atlanta, and Sea of Shadows), to allow you to further delve into the world of Wraith. Please note extra for shipping outside US/Canada.

Shrouded Reaper: You will receive a copy of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, a copy of the Wraith 20th PDF, and the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left). You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You will also receive the Wraith 20th Storyteller's Screen, a sturdy three-panel screen featuring darkly beautiful art from the Wr20 book on the outer side, and on the inside there's a selection of charts and other info to make the Storyteller's job a little bit easier. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as a Reaper. You'll receive PDFs of the classic Wraith Players' Guide and Shadow Players' Guide, to allow you to further explore your characters, as well as PDFs of four classic Wraith setting books (Haunts, Midnight Express, Necropolis: Atlanta, and Sea of Shadows), to allow you to further delve into the world of Wraith. Please note extra for shipping outside US/Canada.

Scriven Restless: You will receive a copy of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition signed by Rich Dansky, a copy of the Wraith 20th PDF, and the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left). You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as a Reaper. Please note extra for shipping outside US/Canada.

Shrouded Scriven Restless: You will receive a copy of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition signed by Rich Dansky, a copy of the Wraith 20th PDF, and the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left). You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You will also receive the Wraith 20th Storyteller's Screen, a sturdy three-panel screen featuring darkly beautiful art from the Wr20 book on the outer side, and on the inside there's a selection of charts and other info to make the Storyteller's job a little bit easier. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as a Reaper. Please note extra for shipping outside US/Canada.

Dead Together: You will receive two copies of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, two copies of the Wraith 20th PDF, and two copies of the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left). You'll get two digital wallpapers featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You can list two names (real names or two characters' names, or one of each) on the credits page as Wraiths. Please note extra for shipping outside US/Canada.

Restless Fetter: You will receive a copy of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, a copy of the Wraith 20th PDF, and the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left). You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as a Helldiver, plus your character's name will be used as a name in the text of Wraith 20 or the next Wraith 20th book we're working on.

Writter's Fetter: You will receive a copy of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, a copy of the Wraith 20th PDF, and the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left). You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as a Helldiver, plus your character's name will be used as a name in the text of the Wraith 20 Fiction Anthology.

Inundated Dead: You will receive a copy of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, a copy of the Wraith 20th PDF, and the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left). You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as a Wraith. You will also receive the Wraith Complete PDFs Bundle containing every Wraith: the Oblivion PDF available on DTRPG: 35 PDFs in all! Please note extra for shipping outside US/Canada

Inundated Shrouded Dead: You will receive a copy of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, a copy of the Wraith 20th PDF, and the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left). You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You will also receive the Wraith 20th Storyteller's Screen, a sturdy three-panel screen featuring darkly beautiful art from the Wr20 book on the outer side, and on the inside there's a selection of charts and other info to make the Storyteller's job a little bit easier. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as a Wraith. You will also receive the Wraith Complete PDFs Bundle containing every Wraith: the Oblivion PDF available on DTRPG: 35 PDFs in all! Please note extra for shipping outside US/Canada

Restless Stygian: You will receive a copy of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, a copy of the Wraith 20th PDF, and the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left). You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as a Helldiver, plus you or your character's name will be forever a part of Wraith as we incorporate your name as the name of a locale in Stygia.

Restless Artifact: You will receive a copy of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, a copy of the Wraith 20th PDF, and the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left). You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as a Helldiver, plus you will be used as a model for characters in an upcoming Wraith 20th book (you must provide photographic reference for the artists; we'll contact you with details).

Restless Legacy: You will receive a copy of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, a copy of the Wraith 20th PDF, and the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left). You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as a Helldiver, plus you receive a character sheet customized for your character and including a portrait by Ken Meyer Jr of your character.

Whispers of the Deadguy: You will receive a copy of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, a copy of the Wraith 20th PDF, and the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left). You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as a Doomslayer, plus the DeadGuy himself, Rich Dansky, will red-line and critique your one of your writing efforts. Rich's writing workshops are always massively attended, but this is your chance for one-on-one attention.

Stygian Merchant: (For qualified retailers inside the US/Canada only. Contact richt@theonyxpath.com to confirm your status.) You will receive five copies of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, five copies of the Wraith 20th PDF, and five copies of the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left), you get 5 beautiful electronic wallpaper files featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th, and you can list five names (real names or characters' names) on the credits page as Wraiths. You will also receive five copies of the Wraith 20th Storytellers Screen as a Retailer bonus. This is for retailers inside the US/Canada only

Screams from the Tempest: You will receive a copy of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, a copy of the Wraith 20th PDF, and the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left). You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as a Doomslayer, plus you'll be contacted to join Rich Dansky's personal Wraith 20 playtest group for at least one session.

Circle (US/Canada): You will receive five copies of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, five copies of the Wraith 20th PDF, and five copies of the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left), you get 5 beautiful electronic wallpaper files featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th, and you can list five names (real names or characters' names) on the credits page as a Wraiths. Shipping for US/Canada only.

Stygian Merchant: (For qualified retailers outside the US/Canada only. Contact richt@theonyxpath.com to confirm your status.) You will receive five copies of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, five copies of the Wraith 20th PDF, and five copies of the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left), you get 5 beautiful electronic wallpaper files featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th, and you can list five names (real names or characters' names) on the credits page as Wraiths. You will also receive five copies of the Wraith 20th Storytellers Screen as a Retailer bonus. This is for retailers outside the US/Canada only

Circle (nonUS/Canada): You will receive five copies of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, five copies of the Wraith 20th PDF, and five copies of the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left), you get 5 beautiful electronic wallpaper files featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th, and you can list five names (real names or characters' names) on the credits page as a Wraiths. Shipping outside US/Canada only.

Deathlord: You will receive a copy of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, a copy of the Wraith 20th PDF, and the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left). You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You will also receive the Wraith 20th Storyteller's Screen, a sturdy three-panel screen featuring darkly beautiful art from the Wr20 book on the outer side, and on the inside there's a selection of charts and other info to make the Storyteller's job a little bit easier. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as a Wraith. You will also receive the Wraith Complete PDFs Bundle containing every Wraith: the Oblivion PDF available on DTRPG: 35 PDFs in all! Also you'll be listed in the “Special Thanks” section as you are brought into the inner sanctum to participate in the creation of an upcoming Wraith 20th book as a Consulting Developer. You'll be included on every email exchange, Skype meeting, phone call, and exchange of threats and insults between Rich, Rich, and the writers and artists from the beginning to the end of the book's creation.

Audience with Charon: You will receive a copy of the Deluxe Wraith 20th Anniversary Edition, a copy of the Wraith 20th PDF, and the Wraith 20th PoD as close to cost as we can give you (see description in the text to the left). You'll get digital wallpaper featuring a collage of the dark and beautiful art from Wraith: the Oblivion 20th. You will also receive the Wraith 20th Storyteller's Screen, a sturdy three-panel screen featuring darkly beautiful art from the Wr20 book on the outer side, and on the inside there's a selection of charts and other info to make the Storyteller's job a little bit easier. You or your character's name will be listed on the credits page as a Wraith. You will also receive the Wraith Complete PDFs Bundle containing every Wraith: the Oblivion PDF available on DTRPG: 35 PDFs in all!  You'll be listed in the “Special Thanks” section, plus Rich Dansky will run a session of Wraith 20th over Skype for you and your coterie of players.
